context: Do you have any information on Peter Farrelly? I know he's director, but I'm not familiar with his work, not that I know of, at least.

He's one half of the iconic director team, the Farrelly Brothers. He did movies like There's Something About Mary, Stuck on You, and the hilarious classic Shallow Hall (with Jack Black and Gwyneth Paltrow)
There's Something About Mary was hilarious! I remember Matt Dillon starring in that one, but who else starred in it with him?
Cameron Diaz played the main character, Mary. I remember Ben Stiller was also in that movie too.
Oh, yeah. I remember Cameron Diaz now. She's awesome! When was that film released? It seems like so long ago!
resp: It was so long ago. There's Something About Mary came out in July of 1998
